weka.distributed.spark

Class CachingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.distributed.spark.CachingStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class CachingStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Implements a caching strategy based on available cluster memory and size of input on disk. Based on the strategy outlined in Aris Koliopoulos' masters thesis.
    Version:
    $Revision: 11586 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Detail

      • CachingStrategy

        public CachingStrategy(java.lang.String inputPath,
               double totalClusterMem,
               double objectOverhead,
               org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaSparkContext context)
                throws weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        inputPath - the path to the input file/directory
        totalClusterMem - the total available cluster memory (in Gb)
        objectOverhead - overhead factor (as a multiple of on-disk size) for data size in object form in memory
        context - the context to adjust if necessary (can be null).
        Throws:
        weka.distributed.DistributedWekaException - if a problem occurs
